metadata.title: CVE-2018-18246 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Icinga Web 2 before 2.6.2 has CSRF via/icingaweb2/config/moduledisable?name=monitoring to disable the monitoringmodule, or via /icingaweb2/config/moduleenable?name=setup to enable thesetup module.

criterions.comment: icingaweb2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
